title: A fast and simple one-step duplex PCR assay for canine distemper virus (CDV) and canine coronavirus (CCoV) detection
body: In this study, we used the one-step PCR kit which was purchased from Coyote Bioscience Company. The website link is: http://www.coyotebio.com/?productshow2/cid/14/id/47.html.
